name: MazeRush
description:
How many Mazes can you solve in this fun-paced time-attack game? Use your mouse to select the red tile and drag it all the way to the exit. Try to beat your record!

I wanted to try making a simple game with Flutter, there's work to do on state management but it was a fun first try!

Follow me on Twitter! 

https://twitter.com/Wally869
